attributes.action: Prevent the closures of Post Offices in rural areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Post Offices are a vital part of  local communities and for some residents who may be disabled or wheel chair bound the closure of their local branch would be disastrous. The Post Office provides such a wide service for people. Please save the Peoples Post Office

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
